articles.title: Toughest challenge yet awaits SA's Lloyd Harris on dream US Open run - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Lloyd Harris will have his toughest opponent yet in the quarter-finals of the US Open.
articles.content:
South Africa's Lloyd Harris is playing the tennis of his life at the US Open in New York, where he has now progressed to the quarter-finals. 
The 24-year-old recovered from being a set down to beat … [+1084 chars]

articles.title: This is about the right to stand for political office, Ramaphosa says as IEC gives ANC a lifeline - News24
articles.description: The Electoral Commission of South Africa’s decision to reopen candidate and voter registration is set to boost the ANC’s local government election campaign.
